item.title: Trump, allies cast Charlie Kirk as ‘martyr’ whose legacy can shape GOP future
item.description: Charlie Kirk was cast as a “martyr” by President Donald Trump and others at a massive memorial in Arizona for the slain Turning Point USA co-founder.

item.title: Trump, allies cast Charlie Kirk as ‘martyr’ whose legacy can shape GOP future
Highlights: Trump, Vance and Republicans vow at memorial to carry on activist’s legacy
item.description: Thousands of mourners, including President Donald Trump, attended the memorial service for conservative activist Charlie Kirk on Sunday.
